text: Ila wone ayo mng'holoze munhu yula yabagame halingumgana ayo mdala yafililwe na mlume wa heye, lelo mdala ayo koluta hali wasekulu wa muji na kulonga, ‘Mkulugwe mlume wa heni yabagame kangulema kulutiliza itagwa lya mkulugwe yabagame kuli isi ya Isilaeli, halingugana kunditila nachoyali yodita mkulugwe mlume wa heni.’
